7: Action and Env Specific - Activates when the current block is directly above the target with similar angle, actions push the block down by hitting the keypoint 8.
206: Action Trajectory Specific - Activates on actions that start from the left side of the target block and make gradual turns to go right and above the target block to approach the current block. Consistent (and small) distance between target and current block. Late denoising steps.
922: Environment Specific - Activates when the block is pretty much on the target but slightly to the right. The actions are always closest to top right keypoint adjusting the top right corner of the block in small increments.
1198: Environment Specific - Activates when the block is pretty much on the target but slightly to the right. The actions are starting from the top right of horizontal block, and ending near bottom right of it.
2043: Action Specific - Activates on actions that start around bottom right of target (goal) block and moves upward to approach the current block. Last few denoising steps.
2037: Environment Specific - Current block has similar angle as target, and is above it along that angle.
2029: Action Specific - Actions start on top of target block and move to right and down to approach the current block. Last few denoising steps and early step idx.
2025: Action and Env Specific - Current block is ~ 70 deg to right of target, actions push the bottom of current block to the left. Last few denoising steps.
